code_SemperKI.handlers.projectAndProcessManagement.logger¶
code_SemperKI.handlers.projectAndProcessManagement.fireWebsocketEvents(projectID, processID, session, event, operation='')¶

Fire websocket event from a list for a specific project and process. If it should fire for only specific operations like messages or files, specify so.

Parameters:

  • projectID (Str) – The project ID

  • processID (Str) – The process ID

  • session (Dict) – The session of the current user

  • event (Str) – The event to fire

  • operation (Str) – Nothing or messages, files, …

Returns:

Nothing

Return type:

None
